name: AI Pipelines
motivation: Complex prediction or synthesis use cases are often difficult to accomplish with a single AI tool or model.
solution: Divide the problem into smaller consecutive steps, then combine several existing AI tools or custom models into an inference-time AI pipeline, where each specialized tool or model is responsible for a single step.
consequences: More tools and models need to be integrated, but the provided is result is of higher quality. Each step can be optimized individually.
examples: Typical computer vision inference pipelines as described in 126
